item.title: Looking for someone who can help create YouTube videos - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

We run a YouTube channel about Technology and we’re looking for someone who can help make videos for our channel.

We would provide you with the video title and you would create a video around it.

This would consist of
❂ Writing an original script
❂ Doing a voice over
❂ Finding clips to use
❂ Editing the video

The videos need to be at least 10 minutes long each.

This is a $100 per video contract.

We’re looking for someone to work with long term on this so if you’re interested let me know and I’ll send you some samples of the types of videos we’re looking for and you can let me know if you can do it.

Also, if you’ve ever worked on any YouTube videos, please attach samples of your work.

I look forward to hopefully working with you!

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 16, 2024 22:10 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, YouTube Development, Motion Graphics, YouTube, Caption, Video Production, YouTube Marketing, YouTube Automation
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, YouTube Development, Motion Graphics, YouTube, Caption, Video Production, YouTube Marketing, YouTube Automation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor and Uploader for YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled video editor who can help us edit and upload long and short YouTube videos. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing software and be familiar with various platforms for uploading videos. The main responsibilities include editing videos to enhance their quality, adding captions or subtitles, and ensuring smooth transitions between scenes. Additionally, the candidate will be responsible for uploading the edited videos to all relevant platforms, such as YouTube, Vimeo, and social media channels. Attention to detail, creativity, and a good understanding of video editing techniques are essential for this role.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 16, 2024 22:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Spain
click to apply

item.title: Motion Graphics and Motion Tracking Video Editor Needed - Upwork
item.description:
The Project:

There is a  7-second video of a T-Rex stomping towards the camera.
There is a still image of a cap (hat).
The goal is to seamlessly add the cap to the T-Rex's head throughout the video, making it appear to stay put and scale proportionally as the T-Rex moves.

Skills Required:

Proficiency in motion graphics software and motion tracking.

Deliverable: Seven second video in mp4 format plus the entire project file, e.g.,. After Effects, Premier Pro, or Final Cut project file of the T-Rex with the cap on its head.

In response to the posting, please provide the following:

* Examples of your work with motion graphics and motion tracking.

*  Amount of time it will take to complete the job.

* Your fee




Posted On: June 16, 2024 21:59 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Final Cut Pro, Video Commercial, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Final Cut Pro, Video Commercial, Motion Graphics, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Project Assistant For YouTube Police Body & Dash Cam - Upwork
item.description:
I'm seeking a detail-oriented assistant for a true crime YouTube channel. The primary responsibility will be to request 50 body-cam videos per day from police departments. Ideal candidates should have excellent communication skills, a persistent and professional attitude, and the ability to manage and organize large amounts of data. Experience with public records requests or a background in law enforcement is a plus.


Budget: $60
Posted On: June 16, 2024 21:54 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Concept Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Research Methods
Skills: Concept Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Research Methods
Country: United States

item.title: YouTube Ad Creation with Conversion Goal - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for someone who can create a YouTube ad campaign with the goal of increasing conversions. The video has for the most part been created already - what we need is mostly someone with experience managing Youtube Ads, that can add the Call to Action button on the video for potential leads to click on. Any other ideas they can come up with to increase conversions will be considered and taken to account. Someone that enjoys doing this and motivated.

This project requires expertise in video editing, copywriting, and online advertising. The freelancer should have experience in creating successful YouTube ad campaigns that have generated a high number of conversions. The ideal candidate should be able to understand our brand and target audience, and create an ad that aligns with our marketing objectives. If you have a proven track record in creating YouTube ads that drive conversions, we would love to hear from you.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 16, 2024 21:43 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Google Ads, YouTube Marketing, Google Analytics, Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Google Ads, YouTube Marketing, Google Analytics, Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Help me with my YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
So my I'm helping my husband start a Youtube Channel and we need help specifically with the VISUALS on the Channel (banner, theme thumbnails, video editing).  Ideally I'd like to be able to give you the theme/ tone/ vibe we're going for, send you some videos and you add the text graphics, music, all video editing and then send it back to me in a format that I can easily upload to the Channel.  I am not looking for you to help with Marketing, this is strictly content creation.  I primarily video him from my iPhone currently.  So I don't  care your location as long as we can easily transfer information/ video/ communicate with one another and you have a quick turn around time.  We don't have big budget so but this could be quick work and a long term project for the right person.  I'll put a link the channel below.  I'm pretty good with the "shorts" but again videos on YouTube are presenting me with a challenge.  I don't really care how many years of experience or degrees you have just that you have done this before, we can communicate easily and the turn around time is quick and that we can transfer the videos to one another quickly and easy.
https://www.youtube.com/@BigDawgJackPot-sz9kn

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 16, 2024 21:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, Audio Editing, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, Audio Editing, Video Production, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Germany-based Video Creator for Unboxing and Using Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video creator based in Germany to create an engaging unboxing and using video in German for our 8-piece Duster set with a telescope rod. The video should showcase the features and benefits of the product, and demonstrate how it can be effectively used.

Requirements:

- Fluency in German language
- Solid experience in video creation and editing
- Ability to capture high-quality footage and audio
- Creative storytelling skills
- Attention to detail in terms of product presentation
- Knowledge of video editing software and equipment

If you are passionate about creating visually appealing and informative videos, and have a good understanding of the German market, we would love to hear from you. Please provide examples of your previous work along with your application and use the word: „Staubmagnet“ in your application mail.

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 16, 2024 21:24 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Videography, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, Videography, Video Commercial
Country: Germany
click to apply
